snippet: The Bloomberg administration expressed support for a City Council bill that would hamper federal authorities’ ability to detain and deport foreign-born inmates on Rikers Island about to be released.
lead_paragraph: The Bloomberg administration expressed support for a City Council bill that would hamper federal authorities’ ability to detain and deport foreign-born inmates on Rikers Island about to be released.

headline.main: In Change, Bloomberg Backs Obstacle to Deportation
headline.print_headline: In Change, Mayor Backs Obstacle to Deportation
headline.seo: Law Expected in New York City Would Hamper Inmate Deportations
